= }} Semnan (; , also Romanized as Semnān and Samnān) is a city in and capital of Semnan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was 124,999, in 36,298 families. Semnan is located 216 kilometers east of Tehran. ==References== ==Other websites== * Semnan.ir Category:Cities in Iran Category:Semnan Province
